fields.name: AGIORGITIKO BUTARI
fields.notes: Best served between 14 - 16 °C. Suitable for red meats with sweet vegetables or sweet saouces, such as rooster with noodles. Sousages and fat cheese such as edam or cheddar.

fields.name: BLOCK NINE
fields.notes: With hints of ginger and spice, this wine makes an excellent complement to light appetizer and dessert fare for a holiday gathering.

fields.name: BODEGA LURTON
fields.notes: Solid notes of black currant blended with a light citrus make this wine an easy pour for varied palates.

fields.name: CHATEAU DE SAINT COSME
fields.notes: The aromas of fruit and spice give one a hint of the light drinkability of this lovely wine, which makes an excellent complement to fish dishes.

fields.name: CHATEAU LE DOYENNE
fields.notes: Though dense and chewy, this wine does not overpower with its finely balanced depth and structure. It is a truly luxurious experience for the senses.

fields.name: DOMAINE DU BOUSCAT
fields.notes: The light golden color of this wine belies the bright flavor it holds. A true summer wine, it begs for a picnic lunch in a sun-soaked vineyard.

fields.name: DOMAINE SERENE
fields.notes: Though subtle in its complexities, this wine is sure to please a wide range of enthusiasts. Notes of pomegranate will delight as the nutty finish completes the picture of a fine sipping experience.

fields.name: LAN RIOJA CRIANZA
fields.notes: A resurgence of interest in boutique vineyards has opened the door for this excellent foray into the dessert wine market. Light and bouncy, with a hint of black truffle, this wine will not fail to tickle the taste buds.

fields.name: LES MORIZOTTES
fields.notes: Breaking the mold of the classics, this offering will surprise and undoubtedly get tongues wagging with the hints of coffee and tobacco in perfect alignment with more traditional notes.  Sure to please the late-night crowd with the slight jolt of adrenaline it brings.

fields.name: MARGERUM SYBARITE
fields.notes: The cache of a fine Cabernet in ones wine cellar can now be replaced with a childishly playful wine bubbling over with tempting tastes of black cherry and licorice. This is a taste sure to transport you back in time.

fields.name: OWEN ROE
fields.notes: A one-two punch of black pepper and jalapeno will send your senses reeling, as the orange essence snaps you back to reality. Don't miss this award-winning taste sensation.

fields.name: REX HILL
fields.notes: One cannot doubt that this will be the wine served at the Hollywood award shows, because it has undeniable star power. Be the first to catch the debut that everyone will be talking about tomorrow.

fields.name: VITICCIO CLASSICO RISERVA
fields.notes: Though soft and rounded in texture, the body of this wine is full and rich and oh-so-appealing. This delivery is even more impressive when one takes note of the tender tannins that leave the taste buds wholly satisfied.

fields.name: PAPAIOANNOY
fields.notes: Known for his powerful smell of his yellow fruits. Best served with poultry and whtite souces at 11 °C.

fields.name: OVILOS
fields.notes: Wine with an intense purple color that matures 18 months in new French oak barrels. Composite and pure aroma of ripe red fruit caramel, cedar, chocolate and spice with hints of nuts. Exuberant and intense flavor with full body, good structure, a characteristic presence of tannins which give long finish and great aging potential.

fields.name: DUM VINUM SPERUM '08
fields.notes: This wine has a great bright yellow color with some gold highlights. The variety of Chardonnay typically expressed together with the finesse of French high quality wood. On the nose aromas emerge lime, orange blossom and pineapple with butter, sweet wood and hints of almond and metallikotitas. In the mouth it is rich and complex with crisp acidity, with aromas of citrus and tropical fruits with hints of vanilla and coconut. The aftertaste is rich, capacity, complexity and duration.

fields.name: ANNY`S ANIMUS CAB. SAUVIGNON '04
fields.notes: It is characterized by aromas of red fruit, vanilla, cedar and spice. In the mouth it is extremely robust and rich with gentle tannins. Evolved in oak barrels for 24 months and about 24 months in the bottle. Susceptible to long aging.
